fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- May roll in any slot, after this is rolled, you will instantly reroll for free but your next role will keep the **GIM+ Perks!!!**.
- **GIM+ Perks:**
> - You may make your vote count as 2 secretly at any time.
> - You may reroll your role slot in the middle of the game once, keeping the **GIM+ Perks!!!**.
> - You may Self-target and Multitask up to 3 different Abilities/Factional actions.
> - You learn the role of cleaned targets.
> - You may send a single message publically or to your evil faction chat after death.
